#nametype [nametype]: 106
The Legatus Legionis is a high commander of an Imperial Legion. Only the most able commanders are chosen for the task and only candidates with political backing, strong personalities and exceptional skill will receive the honor. These able men command great respect from their soldiers and will inspire them to great deeds.
